title: sverigesradio.se is not working
body:
<!-- BUG TEMPLATE -->

### svtplay-dl versions:

2.1

### Operating system and Python version:

macOS 10.14.2  ,  py3.7 from brew

### What is the issue:

Always include the URL you want to download and all switches you are using.
You should also add `--verbose` because it makes it much easier for use to find the issue :)

```➜  lib git:(master) ✗ python3 -m svtplay_dl https://sverigesradio.se/sida/avsnitt/1221645\?programid\=2795 -v
DEBUG [1547064596.851451] /Users/johan/dev/svtplay-dl-dev/lib/svtplay_dl/utils/getmedia.py/get_media: version: 0+untagged.2106.g806fd55
DEBUG [1547064596.8545651] /Users/johan/dev/svtplay-dl-dev/lib/svtplay_dl/service/__init__.py/__init__: service: sr
DEBUG [1547064596.854659] /Users/johan/dev/svtplay-dl-dev/lib/svtplay_dl/utils/http.py/request: HTTP getting 'https://sverigesradio.se/sida/avsnitt/1221645?programid=2795'
DEBUG [1547064596.866604] /usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/urllib3/connectionpool.py/_new_conn: Starting new HTTPS connection (1): sverigesradio.se:443
DEBUG [1547064597.246291] /usr/local/lib/python3.7/site-packages/urllib3/connectionpool.py/_make_request: https://sverigesradio.se:443 "GET /sida/avsnitt/1221645?programid=2795 HTTP/1.1" 200 None
ERROR [1547064597.312939] /Users/johan/dev/svtplay-dl-dev/lib/svtplay_dl/utils/getmedia.py/get_one_media: No videos found. Can't find audio info```

title: Crash with empty config file (TypeError: argument of type 'NoneType' is not iterable)
body:
```
$ touch ~/.svtplay-dl.yaml

$ svtplay-dl https://www.svtplay.se/video/19791000/forsta-dejten/forsta-dejten-sasong-2-en-kat-blick-sager-mer-an-1000-ord
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/svtplay-dl", line 7, in <module>
    svtplay_dl.main()
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/svtplay-dl/2.0/libexec/lib/python3.7/site-packages/svtplay_dl/__init__.py", line 63, in main
    get_media(urls[0], config, __version__)
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/svtplay-dl/2.0/libexec/lib/python3.7/site-packages/svtplay_dl/utils/getmedia.py", line 42, in get_media
    stream = service_handler(sites, options, url)
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/svtplay-dl/2.0/libexec/lib/python3.7/site-packages/svtplay_dl/service/__init__.py", line 210, in service_handler
    handler = i(options, url)
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/svtplay-dl/2.0/libexec/lib/python3.7/site-packages/svtplay_dl/service/__init__.py", line 34, in __init__
    service=self.__class__.__name__.lower()).get_variable(), config.get_variable())
  File "/usr/local/Cellar/svtplay-dl/2.0/libexec/lib/python3.7/site-packages/svtplay_dl/utils/parser.py", line 269, in readconfig
    if "default" in configdata:
TypeError: argument of type 'NoneType' is not iterable

$ rm ~/.svtplay-dl.yaml

$ svtplay-dl https://www.svtplay.se/video/19791000/forsta-dejten/forsta-dejten-sasong-2-en-kat-blick-sager-mer-an-1000-ord
INFO: Selected to download dash, bitrate: 3083
INFO: Outfile: forsta.dejten.s02e03.en.kat.blick.sager.mer.an.1000.ord-d61f355-svtplay.m4a
[010/582][==...........................................................................................................................................] ETA: 0:00:41^C

$ svtplay-dl --version
svtplay-dl 2.0
```

Related to #957

title: tv.nrk.no broken
body: tv.nrk.no has been redesigned, and downloading programmes and episodes doesn't work anymore.

title: Not working with cmore.se
body:
I can't seem to dl from cmore.se. Although I am not sure if it is supposed to. Youtube-dl does not work with cmore.se. If I try to use `svtplay-dl --verbose -S -P hls --username=<username> --password=<password> "https://www.cmore.se/serie/88259-torpederna/sasong-1/episod-6/3844853-torpederna"`This is the output I get:

```
DEBUG [1509723944.6917374] site-packages\svtplay_dl-1.9.6-py3.5.egg\svtplay_dl\utils\__init__.py/request: HTTP getting 'https://www.cmore.se/serie/88259-torpederna/sasong-1/episod-6/3844853-torpederna'
DEBUG [1509723944.8591826] site-packages\svtplay_dl-1.9.6-py3.5.egg\svtplay_dl\utils\__init__.py/request: HTTP getting 'https://www.cmore.se/login'
DEBUG [1509723944.8687086] site-packages\svtplay_dl-1.9.6-py3.5.egg\svtplay_dl\utils\__init__.py/request: HTTP getting 'https://account.cmore.se/session?client=web'
DEBUG [1509723945.1258924] site-packages\svtplay_dl-1.9.6-py3.5.egg\svtplay_dl\utils\__init__.py/request: HTTP getting 'https://www.cmore.se/serie/88259-torpederna/sasong-1/episod-6/3844853-torpederna'
ERROR [1509723945.1379244] site-packages\svtplay_dl-1.9.6-py3.5.egg\svtplay_dl\__init__.py/get_one_media: Can't find video id
```

title: --all-last=n doesn't always do the right thing
body:
I use `--all-last=1` on viafree to download only the latest episode but now suddenly it will download episode 01 instead of episode 04. Some channels don't list the episodes from newest to oldest but viafree do that but now suddenly svtplay-dl have changed the download order and download oldest first. Or is it viafree that have changed something?
```
svtplay-dl -A -S -P hls --all-last=1 https://www.viafree.se/program/livsstil/skonhetsfallan-sverige
INFO: Episode 1 of 1
INFO: Url: https://www.viafree.se/program/livsstil/skonhetsfallan-sverige/sasong-3/avsnitt-1
INFO: Selected to download hls, bitrate: 2465
INFO: Outfile: skonhetsfallan-sverige.s03e01-870310-viafree.ts
[021/260][=====.................................................................] ETA: 0:01:20
```
(episode 01 don't have any subtitles for some unknown reason)

It should be downloading:
INFO: Outfile: skonhetsfallan-sverige.s03e04-876731-viafree.ts

title: Option -A for viafree
body: The option to get all episodes on viafree not working  ..

title: ValueError while determining language of subtitle
body:
Encountered while executing:

    ./svtplay-dl -M --convert-subtitle-colors -t -A https://www.svtplay.se/skam?tab=sasong4

Results in (excerpt):

```
INFO: Episode 2 of 10
INFO: Url: http://www.svtplay.se/video/13356584/skam/skam-sasong-4-avsnitt-2
INFO: Outfile: skam.s04e02.avsnitt.2-eb0a706-svtplay.srt
INFO: Selected to download dash, bitrate: 3285
INFO: Outfile: skam.s04e02.avsnitt.2-eb0a706-svtplay.m4a
[184/184][===========================================================] ETA: 0:00:00
INFO: Outfile: skam.s04e02.avsnitt.2-eb0a706-svtplay.mp4
[185/185][===========================================================] ETA: 0:00:00
INFO: Merge audio, video and subtitle into skam.s04e02.avsnitt.2-eb0a706-svtplay.mp4
INFO: Determining the language of the subtitle.
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 162, in _run_module_as_main
    "__main__", fname, loader, pkg_name)
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/runpy.py", line 72, in _run_code
    exec code in run_globals
  File "./svtplay-dl/__main__.py", line 13, in <module>
  File "./svtplay-dl/svtplay_dl/__init__.py", line 466, in main
  File "./svtplay-dl/svtplay_dl/__init__.py", line 194, in get_media
  File "./svtplay-dl/svtplay_dl/__init__.py", line 223, in get_all_episodes
  File "./svtplay-dl/svtplay_dl/__init__.py", line 333, in get_one_media
  File "./svtplay-dl/svtplay_dl/postprocess/__init__.py", line 166, in merge
  File "./svtplay-dl/svtplay_dl/postprocess/__init__.py", line 84, in sublanguage
  File "./svtplay-dl/svtplay_dl/postprocess/__init__.py", line 42, in query
  File "/usr/lib/python2.7/random.py", line 323, in sample
    raise ValueError("sample larger than population")
ValueError: sample larger than population
```

Occurs for episodes 2, 4, 7 and 9. Since the error occurs while merging, .m4a, .mp4 and .srt files are left.  If executing the command again, the episode will (predictably) be skipped. Equivalent error for targeting the specific affected episodes.

The left-over files seem fine, so the obvious workaround is either not requesting a merge or merging them yourself afterwards. Haven't tried this, though.

svtplay-dl 1.9.4 on Linux.

title: svtplay.se JSONDecodeError
body:
Been hitting this on anything I try to download:

(Below output is from: svtplay-dl -A https://www.svtplay.se/kom-ketchup-sa-gar-vi/ --verbose)

```
DEBUG [1498052162.8733118] /usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/utils/__init__.py/request: HTTP getting 'https://www.svtplay.se/kom-ketchup-sa-gar-vi/'

INFO [1498052163.987317] /usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/__init__.py/get_all_episodes: Url: https://www.svtplay.se/video/138695/kom-ketchup-sa-gar-vi/kom-ketchup-sa-gar-vi-sasong-1-avsnitt-1
DEBUG [1498052163.9874523] /usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/utils/__init__.py/request: HTTP getting 'https://www.svtplay.se/video/138695/kom-ketchup-sa-gar-vi/kom-ketchup-sa-gar-vi-sasong-1-avsnitt-1'
DEBUG [1498052164.8840272] /usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/utils/__init__.py/request: HTTP getting 'http://api.svt.se/videoplayer-api/video/1138000-001A'
ERROR [1498052165.5496392] /usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/__init__.py/get_one_media: version: 1.9.4
Traceback (most recent call last):
  File "/usr/local/bin/svtplay-dl", line 7, in <module>
    svtplay_dl.main()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/__init__.py", line 466, in main
    get_media(urls[0], options)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/__init__.py", line 194, in get_media
    get_all_episodes(stream, copy.copy(options), url)
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/__init__.py", line 223, in get_all_episodes
    get_one_media(substream, copy.copy(options))
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/__init__.py", line 244, in get_one_media
    for i in streams:
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/svtplay_dl/service/svtplay.py", line 74, in get
    janson = res.json()
  File "/usr/local/lib/python3.5/site-packages/requests/models.py", line 894, in json
    return complexjson.loads(self.text, **kwargs)
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.5/json/__init__.py", line 319, in loads
    return _default_decoder.decode(s)
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.5/json/decoder.py", line 339, in decode
    obj, end = self.raw_decode(s, idx=_w(s, 0).end())
  File "/usr/lib64/python3.5/json/decoder.py", line 357, in raw_decode
    raise JSONDecodeError("Expecting value", s, err.value) from None
json.decoder.JSONDecodeError: Expecting value: line 1 column 1 (char 0)
```

title: using multiple arguments and -A creates an directory with the name of the first file.
svtplay.se crash (AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'attrib')
body:
```
~/Downloads
$ svtplay-dl http://www.svtplay.se/video/11015221/aktuellt/aktuellt-9-nov-22-00
ERROR: svtplay-dl crashed
ERROR: Run again and add --verbose as an argument, to get more information
ERROR: If the error persists, you can report it at https://github.com/spaam/svtplay-dl/issues
ERROR: Include the URL used, the stack trace and the output of svtplay-dl --version in the issue

AttributeError: 'NoneType' object has no attribute 'attrib'

~/Downloads

1.7

Python 2.7.12
```

title: "No subtitles available" when there seems to be subtitles available
body:
```
$ svtplay-dl --require-subtitle http://www.svtplay.se/video/7241917/fallet-o-j-simpson-american-crime-story/fallet-o-j-simpson-american-crime-story-sasong-1-the-dream-team
INFO: No subtitles available
```

But the video do have subtitles:

![screen shot 2016-04-03 at 09 56 29](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/42626/14231413/714df240-f982-11e5-9ac4-9095114f1835.png)

title: UNC path name will be included in the file name
body:
When i try to save with -o to an UNC path the path will be included in the file name:

```
python svtplay-dl http://www.tv4play.se/program/det-tredje-%C3%B6gat?video_id=3192335 -o "\\xbmcbuntu\TV Shows\_test"
INFO: Selected to download hls, bitrate: 4496
INFO: Outfile: \\xbmcbuntu\TV Shows\_test/xbmcbuntutv-showstestdet-tredje-ogat-del-8-tv4-play-3192335-tv4play.ts
```

Is this something you can fix so it will not add the path to the file name?
I know i can map a network drive but i use several UNC paths so it would not work very well for me :(
